Description: This detection identifies potential tampering of the Windows event logs using tools such as wevtutil, Clear-EventLog, PowerShell, or VBScript. Clearing logs is a common technique used by attackers to erase evidence of malicious activity and evade detection.
Name: ada594b1-b53e-41f7-8ce8-5cb309c71e91
Query:
let WevtutilEvents = DeviceProcessEvents
| where InitiatingProcessAccountName !in~ ("SYSTEM", "LOCAL SERVICE", "NETWORK SERVICE")
| where FileName in~ ("wevtutil.exe", "powershell.exe", "cmd.exe", "wscript.exe", "cscript.exe")
| where (
    ProcessCommandLine has_any ("wevtutil cl", "Remove-Item", ".evtx", "clear-log", "cl System", "cl Security", "cl Application")
    or ProcessCommandLine matches regex @"(?i)(wevtutil|clear\-log|Clear\-EventLog|cl)\s+(Security|System|Application)"
)
| where ProcessCommandLine !contains "cl /?"
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, InitiatingProcessAccountName, InitiatingProcessParentFileName, ProcessCommandLine,InitiatingProcessCommandLine, Source = "DeviceProcessEvents", ReportId, DeviceId;
let ClearEventLogEvents = DeviceEvents
| where ActionType == "PowerShellCommand"
| where InitiatingProcessAccountName !in~ ("SYSTEM", "LOCAL SERVICE", "NETWORK SERVICE")
| where tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).Command) has "Clear-EventLog"
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, InitiatingProcessAccountName, InitiatingProcessParentFileName,ProcessCommandLine = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).Command),InitiatingProcessCommandLine, Source = "DeviceEvents", ReportId, DeviceId;
WevtutilEvents
| union ClearEventLogEvents
| order by TimeGenerated desc
